price: 5. Waxaan u malaynaynay inaysan dadka iyo jinkaba ka been sheegin Alle.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
